message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value at $12,000 to you. I understand its importance and would like to offer it to you at a special price. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional item for $10,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value to you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or finalizing the purchase.
